data.chText: 简单的；易懂的；不复杂的
data.enText: easy to do or to understand; not complicated
It's quite straightforward to get here.

before.enText: of a person or their behaviour

data.enText: honest and open; not trying to trick sb or hide sth

data.chText: 我来把它说得更直截了当一些。
data.enText: Let me put it more straightforwardly.

example: he is not being as straightforward as it appears
their business was open and aboveboard
straightforward in all his business affairs

value.def: If you describe something as straightforward, you approve of it because it is easy to do or understand.

example.ex: Disposable nappies are fairly straightforward to put on...
example.tran: 一次性尿布很容易穿上。
这个问题看起来够简单的。

example.ex: Acid rain is not straightforwardly attributable to the burning of coal...
example.tran: 酸雨并非简单地由烧煤造成。

example.ex: Nor does scientific knowledge derive straightforwardly from experiments and observations.
example.tran: 科学知识也并非简单地从试验和观察中得来。

value.def: If you describe a person or their behaviour as straightforward, you approve of them because they are honest and direct, and do not try to hide their feelings.

example.ex: She is very blunt, very straightforward and very honest...
example.tran: 她非常直率，很坦诚，也非常诚实。

example.ex: I was impressed by his straightforward intelligent manner.
example.tran: 我很欣赏他的坦率和睿智。

example.ex: His daughter says straightforwardly that he was not good enough.
example.tran: 他的女儿直言他不够好。
